channel.title: Comments on: #50startups: LeadMethod Helps Companies Manage Outside Sales Reps

item.title: By: Texagon Makes First Oregon Investment in LeadMethod | BendTECH
item.dc:creator: Texagon Makes First Oregon Investment in LeadMethod | BendTECH
item.description: […] There’s been a lot of fundraising happening in Bend lately. And now we have a new addition to the investor pool. Texagon Capital, a private equity firm based in Bend and Houston, recently made its first investment in an Oregon-based company by funding LeadMethod, one of our #50startups. […]
